text: Tamen wen ni jin yue [yi li 1 yue,7 yue,11 yue he 12 yue] li zhandou de shi, ni [dui tamen] shuo:“Jin yue li zhandou shi dazui. Fang'ai [renmen] zunxing an la zhi dao, fouren ta, fang'ai [renmen jinru] jin si, quzhu jin si fujin de jumin, zai an la kan lai shi geng da de zui'e. Duo shen chongbai [huo pohai] bi tusha geng yanzhong.” Jiaru tamen you nengli, tamen biding jixu jingong nimen, zhidao shi nimen beipan nimen de zongjiao [yisilan jiao]. Nimen zhong shei beipan ziji de zongjiao [yisilan jiao], qie lin si shi reng bu xinyang zhe, zhexie ren zai jinshi he houshi de shangong bi jiang tulao. Zhexie ren shi huo yu de fanren, tamen jiang yong ju qizhong.
